verses.name: Jeremiah 17:10
verses.text: I the Lord search the heart, I try the reins, even to give every man according to his ways, and according to the fruit of his doings.

verses.name: Jeremiah 17:11
verses.text: As the partridge sitteth on eggs, and hatcheth them not; so he that getteth riches, and not by right, shall leave them in the midst of his days, and at his end shall be a fool.

verses.name: Jeremiah 17:12
verses.text: A glorious high throne from the beginning is the place of our sanctuary.
